prompts: Create a Bug-type Pokemon that resembles a tiny insect with a cute face and bright colors.
Show me a Fairy-type Pokemon with delicate wings and a friendly demeanor, perfect for a garden setting.
Design a Pokemon that combines attributes of butterflies and bees, with vibrant yellow and white colors.
Imagine a tiny Pokemon that flits about flowers, showcasing its enchanting visual features and charm.
Generate a Pokemon with a playful personality, featuring soft, fluffy textures and an adorable body shape.
Make a Pokemon that embodies the beauty of nature, with a focus on floral habitats and bright colors.
Give me a sketch of a Pokemon that can easily be found in sunny meadows, radiating happiness and energy.
